c1.name: Ice Unleashed
c1.effect: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all enemies in its path.

c2.name: Atmospheric Revolution
c2.effect: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

c3.name: Cloudburst
c3.effect: Increases the level of Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Frozen Skies
c4.effect: Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an enemy affected by Cold or Frozen status effects. This effect can only occur once every 2s.

c5.name: The True Path
c5.effect: Increases the level of Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rally of Four Blades
c6.effect: Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star deals 15% more DMG to enemies with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun. This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.
